Name: E-Elementals
About the game: E-Elementals is a story-focused linear 2D puzzle platformer where you play as E-Elemental 1k7. E-Elementals are advanced bots born in a lab that are tasked with doing a variety of tests. As E-Elemental 1k7, you will go on a journey through the lab. You will solve puzzles, fight tough bosses, and learn the history of the lab through various characters that you will speak with... Key features: Use the powerful absorption abilities of E-Elementals to overcome many trials! Journey through a dangerous laboratory with various different zones! Learn the truth about E-Elementals and the laboratory from dialogue with a multitude of interesting characters!
Meta Title: E-Elementals: Jul 15, 2022, Travis Howard and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on E-Elementals? Check out the release date (Jul 15, 2022), developer insights from Travis Howard, and a complete game summary.
